Roxane Hayward (onye a mụrụ Roxane Josephine Hayward, 7 Mee 1991) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa. Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn South Africa, British na American nke gụnyere Leonardo maka CBBC, Beaver Falls maka E4 na Blood Drive yana ihe nkiri, gụnyere Death Race 3: Inferno, nke Universal Pictures mepụtara. N'ihe nkiri, Hayward arụwo ọrụ dị mkpa maka ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù na South Africa gụnyere Shakespeare In Love na Eric Abraham's Fugard Theatre.

N'afọ 2015, Hayward rụrụ ọrụ Susanna White na ihe nkiri Nat Geo nke nwere akụkụ abụọ Saints and Strangers, nke Sony Pictures Television mepụtara, nke gosipụtara n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015. N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2015, Roxane mechara ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri / ihe egwu Accident, nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa, Caroline. Ihe nkiri ahụ malitere na Disemba 2017.

Hayward bụ onye na-ekwuchitere ikike mmadụ na ichebe onwe onye ebe ọ kwadoro nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe gburugburu South Africa na-elekwasị anya n'inye ndị mmadụ ike site na nkà ichebe onwe ha. N'afọ 2017, Hayward mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye nduzi maka ọkwa ọrụ ọha na eze nke akpọrọ Open Your Eyes HeardPSA, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịmepụta mmata banyere ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na ịgba ohu nke oge a.
A mụrụ Hayward na Johannesburg, South Africa, nne na nna kwadoro mkpebi ya ime ihe nkiri dịka ọrụ. Ọ malitere ọzụzụ ihe nkiri ya mgbe ọ dị afọ isii tinyere ịgba egwu, ịbụ abụ na nkuzi piano
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ isii wee debanye aha ya na mgbasa ozi telivishọn mbụ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Hayward malitere ịmụ ihe nkiri, ịgba egwú na ihe nkiri egwu.

N'afọ 2002 mgbe Hayward dị afọ iri na otu, a tụbara ya na mgbasa ozi telivishọn mbụ ya. Hayward wee malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn CBC Jozi-H ebe ọ na-eme nwa okorobịa na-eto eto, nke nwere nsogbu aha ya bụ Daphne bụ onye a nabatara n'ụlọ ọgwụ Johannesburg General Hospital maka ịṅụbiga ọgwụ ókè. Hayward nwere ọrụ ọbịa na ihe omume nke 9 nke usoro Smile, nke malitere na 2006 ma gbaa ọsọ maka otu oge. N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe e mechara Jozi-H, Hayward pụtara na Isidingo nke SABC dị ka nwa okorobịa a na-emegbu nke aha ya bụ Chloe.

N'afọ 2011, Hayward pụtara nke mbụ ya na telivishọn Britain na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ ogige oge okpomọkụ na usoro ihe nkiri Channel 4 Beaver Falls A tụziri Hayward dịka onye nkwado na ihe nkiri mbụ ya Death Race 3: Inferno, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Dougray Scott, Ving Rhames na Danny Trejo
Death Race 3: Inferno bụ nke Universal Pictures mepụtara ma wepụta ya n'afọ 2012.
